name: Albert Barrachina
desc: L’Albert és un professor d’escola molt dedicat amb els seus alumnes. El seu lema es que tothom pot aprendre amb un bon professor. Dedica nit i dia a preparar les classes, fa hores extres a l’institut, i en el seu temps lliure fa castells amb una colla del barri.
descENG: Albert is a devoted school teacher who truly cares about his students. His motto is that anyone can learn with a good teacher. He spends day and night preparing lessons, puts in extra hours at the school, and in his free time, he takes part in the neighbourhood’s Castellers team, building human towers.
